resources.string:
Daisuki tte yappa saikyou 

 Saa seishun maki chirashite 

 Haji wo kaite naite manande 

 Ra ra raibaru kechirashiteke 




 Honki dashite uchi komumono 

 Mune wo atsukusaseru mono 

 Wow gamushara na omoi hitotsu motteke 

 Todokanakute yarosenai koto 

 Mune ga shimetsukerareru koto 

 Wow gamushara janakya ajiwaenai darou? 




 Ride on 

 Shitsuren datte jinsei ni wa spaisu 

 Shippai datte aru sa waraiaou 

 Oogesa datte koe wo agete yorokobe 

 Bokutachi wa doman naka 




 Daisuki tte yappa saikyou 

 Saa seishun maki chirashite 

 Haji wo kaite naite manande 

 Ra ra raibaru kechirashiteke 

 Daisukitte yappa saikyou 

 Iitaiyatsunya iwasetoke 

 Kuishibatte tate manande 

 Ra ra raibaru takameae 

 Kagayate yo mabushiikurai 




 Douse muri to akirameteta koto 

 Sore wo waratteita koto 

 Wow iiwake ge atarimae ni natteta 

 shikatanai yo nigatena mono 

 Bokurasou ningen da mono 

 Wow tasukeau nakama itsuka de au 




 Hey yo 

 Keiken datte yudanshitecha trap 

 Kekka wo ki ni shisugi ja tanoshikunai 

 Yappari "suki koso mono no jouzu nare" 

 Bokutachi hado man naka 




 Daisuki tte yappa saikyou 

 Yaritai koto ha kakusanaide 

 Nigate datte chotto charenji 

 Ra ra raibaru wa happi ni ne 

 Daisuki yappa saikyou 

 Tereteru kimi makikondeke 

 Iji wo hattenai oide yo 

 Ra ra raito wa terashiteru 

 Kagayaite yo mabushii kurai 




 Misetekure yo honki no sugata wo 

 Kimi wa karenu seishun no hana 




 Hazumu tsuyoi mune no to 

 Massuguna omoi koko ni 




 Daisuki tte yappa saikyou 

 Saa seishun maki chirashite 

 Haji wo kaite naite manande 

 Ra ra raibaru kechirashiteke 

 Daisuki tte yappa saikyou 

 Itaiyanya iwasetoke 

 Kuishibatte taete manande 

 Ra ra raibaru takameae 

 Kagayaite yo mabushii kurai
